about_the_game:
Download the Friend's Pass and play Flock of Dogs with a friend for free. If you have a friend who owns Flock of Dogs, they can bring you along on the adventure. 

(I'm currently talking to Steam about how to enable a player to own multiple Friend Slots. Right now, anyone who owns the base game can bring 1 friend along, but no more.)

  • Pilot the whale while your friend rides on a dog

  • Ride on a dog while your friend pilots the whale

  • Go on a co-op roguelike adventure

  • Play minigames at the Minigame Park

You can also treat this as a demo, which you can play solo or co-op, and satisfy your lifelong desire to burst through the clouds on the back of a flying dog.

-Max

Download the Friend's Pass and play Flock of Dogs with a friend for free. If you have a friend who owns Flock of Dogs, they can bring you along on the adventure. 

(I'm currently talking to Steam about how to enable a player to own multiple Friend Slots. Right now, anyone who owns the base game can bring 1 friend along, but no more.)

  • Pilot the whale while your friend rides on a dog

  • Play minigames at the Minigame Park

You can also treat this as a demo, which you can play solo or co-op, and satisfy your lifelong desire to burst through the clouds on the back of a flying dog.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Flock of Dogs - Friend's Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Download the Friend's Pass and play Flock of Dogs with a friend for free. Find a friend who owns the full game and flock together! (This download also works as a free, soloable demo, if you just want to see what it's like to ride a flying dog right now.)
